1. keep the reserve for you in the next 30 minutes waiting for your payment. The reserve will be released in:

If you are not satisfied with the proposed solution, please contact the Kilimall for intervention.

Please enter your information timely if you accept the solution. If you are not satisfied with the proposed solution,please click the "Apply for intervention" button and Kilimall will intervene the case. If the information is not put in 30 days, the aftersale case will be closed automatically considering your relinquishment of the aftersale application and will not be opened again.

Kilimall has intervened the aftersale case and made a reasonable solution. The solution is irrevocable. Please enter your information by clicking the button. If the information is not put in 30 days, the aftersale case will be closed automatically considering your relinquishment of the aftersale application and will not be opened again.

The seller rejected your aftersale application. If you are not satisfied with seller\'s rejection, please click the "Apply for intervention" button and Kilimall will intervene the case.
